movies.title: Black Rose
movies.description: Hindi drama film scheduled for a theatrical release on 8 December 2025 as per advance release calendars; detailed credits are not yet widely documented, so plot and principal cast remain to be formally announced.[1]

movies.title: Bull
movies.description: Upcoming action-oriented Hindi film led by Shahid Kapoor, dated for a theatrical opening on 8 December 2025 in national release calendars; storyline and full team details are yet to be officially circulated in trade sources.[1]

movies.title: Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2
movies.description: Sequel to the 2015 comedy ‘Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon’, fronted by Kapil Sharma and listed on India theatrical calendars for a 12 December 2025 cinema release; plot is expected to continue the protagonist’s chaotic romantic and family entanglements.[1][9]
